<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Diverting Vortex](/Feats.aspx?ID=6100) <actions string="Single Action" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Sorcerer" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=824" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 154 <sup>1.1</sup>

**Requirements**
Your most recent action was to [cast](/Actions.aspx?ID=2734) a noncantrip spell.

</column>

---

You use vestiges of magic to create a protective vortex. Until the start of your next turn, you gain a +1 status bonus to AC against ranged weapon [attacks](/Traits.aspx?ID=540) and physical ranged unarmed attacks.
